title: Emerald Bloom Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Telugu Classic
materials: this majestic Haaram is intricately set with brilliant-cut Diamonds and accented with vibrant Emerald gemstones. Features lustrous South Sea Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish
enhancing the gold's radiant hue and Diamond brilliance.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a classic South Indian floral motif, meticulously crafted with detailed openwork. The floral design includes a line of Jhumka like pendants. Each Diamond is individually set to maximize its sparkle, creating a breathtaking display. Emeralds are bezel set for a smooth, sophisticated finish. At the pendant's base are a set of pearls, a hallmark of the traditional Haaram design.
colors: The overall color palette is dominated by the rich yellow of the 22K gold
complemented by the fiery sparkle of white diamonds and the lush green of the Emeralds. The South Sea pearls add a touch of soft white.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (vivaham)
and significant cultural events (panduga). Ideal as a bridal necklace or for wearing to temple visits.
description: This Emerald Bloom Diamond Haaram is a stunning investment piece and a true heirloom. The intricate craftsmanship, high-quality materials, and timeless design make it a treasured possession. It embodies the rich cultural heritage of South India, combining traditional aesthetics with modern elegance. The radiance of the diamonds and emeralds exude confidence and grace, ensuring you stand out on any special occasion.
